findings.title: Confidentiality may be perpetual / indefinite
findings.rationale: Indefinite confidentiality can create long-term compliance burden and uncertainty around retention and disclosure.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...7. CONFIDENTIALITY Confidentiality obligations are perpetual and continue without time limitation....

MITATION OF LIABILITY
Provider's liability is unlimited and not subject to any limitation of liability clause.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
Client may terminate immediately. Provider requires 90 days notice.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY
Confidentiality obligations are perpetual and continue without time limitation.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

9. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
